mapper.select: SELECT G_CATE_BCODE, CATE_NAME,G_CATE_CODE FROM G_CATE WHERE G_CATE_BCODE = #{g_cate_bcode} AND G_CATE_MCODE IS NULL

SELECT TITLE,DIS_COST,L.LOC_NAME,P.PHOTO,G.G_POST_CODE, J.NICKNAME,G.MEMBER_NUM FROM G_POST G LEFT JOIN LOC L ON G.LOC_CODE = L.LOC_CODE LEFT JOIN G_PHOTO P ON G.G_POST_CODE = P.G_POST_CODE LEFT JOIN JOIN J ON G.B_USER_CODE = J.B_USER_CODE WHERE J.LOC_CODE = #{loc_code} ORDER BY G.WDATE DESC

SELECT TITLE,DIS_COST, L.LOC_NAME, PT.PHOTO, G.G_POST_CODE, J.NICKNAME,G.MEMBER_NUM FROM G_POST G LEFT JOIN JOIN J ON G.B_USER_CODE = J.B_USER_CODE LEFT JOIN G_PHOTO PT ON G.G_POST_CODE = PT.G_POST_CODE LEFT JOIN LOC L ON G.LOC_CODE = L.LOC_CODE WHERE G_CATE_CODE IN (SELECT G_CATE_CODE FROM G_CATE WHERE G_CATE_BCODE = (SELECT G_CATE_CODE FROM G_CATE_INPUT WHERE B_USER_CODE = #{b_user_code}) AND G_CATE_MCODE IS NOT NULL ) AND G.B_USER_CODE != #{b_user_code} AND J.LOC_CODE = #{loc_code} ORDER BY G.WDATE DESC
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM ,DATA.* FROM (SELECT * FROM VIEW_CATEMAINLIST WHERE G_CATE_BCODE= #{g_cate_bcode}) DATA) WHERE #{start} <= RNUM AND RNUM <= #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, DATA.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM VIEW_CATEMAINLIST WHERE G_CATE_BCODE = #{g_cate_bcode} AND G_CATE_MCODE = #{g_cate_code} ) DATA) WHERE #{start} <= RNUM AND RNUM <= #{end}
